definitions: Strengthening or invigorating (someone) mentally or physically.
Providing (a place) with defensive works as protection against attack.
Adding ingredients to increase the nutritional value of (food).
Increasing the strength of (a drink) with alcohol.
examples: The fresh air was fortifying her spirits.
They were fortifying the castle against the siege.
The company is fortifying its cereals with vitamins.
He was fortifying his coffee with a shot of whiskey.
